---
title: NamedFragment
icon: square-c
iconType: solid
---

> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

An abstract class to represent An individual fragment which has a name from a parse ABI.

## Extends

- [`Fragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/Fragment)

## Extended by

- [`ErrorFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/ErrorFragment)
- [`EventFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/EventFragment)
- [`FunctionFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/FunctionFragment)
- [`StructFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/StructFragment)

## Properties

| Property | Modifier | Type | Description | Inherited from |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `inputs` | `readonly` | readonly [`ParamType`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/ParamType)[] | The inputs for the fragment. | [`Fragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/Fragment).`inputs` |
| `name` | `readonly` | `string` | The name of the fragment. | - |
| `type` | `readonly` | [`FragmentType`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/FragmentType) | The type of the fragment. | [`Fragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/Fragment).`type` |

## Methods

### format()

```ts
abstract format(format?): string
```

Returns a string representation of this fragment as `format`.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `format`? | [`FormatType`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/FormatType) |

#### Returns

### from()

```ts
static from(obj): Fragment
```

Creates a new **Fragment** for `obj`, wich can be any supported ABI frgament type.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `obj` | `any` |

#### Returns

### isConstructor()

```ts
static isConstructor(value): value is ConstructorFragment
```
